jupyter: python3

```{python}
import sympy as sym
import numpy as np
import networkx as nx
```

```{python}
G = nx.DiGraph()
G.add_nodes_from([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6])
G.add_edges_from([(1, 2), (2, 3), (3, 4), (4, 2), (1, 4), (3, 1), (3, 6), (6, 3), (4, 5), (5, 6)])
```

Draw using networkx

```{python}
nx.draw(G, with_labels=True)
```

Incidence Matrix

```{python}
adj_mat = nx.to_numpy_array(G)
adj_mat
```

load numpy adjacency matrix into sympy to do rref

```{python}
SM = sym.Matrix(adj_mat)
SM.rref()
```

The null space has 1 basis vector

```{python}
null_basis = sym.Matrix([-1,-1, 0, 1, 1,0])
null_basis
```
